component.notes: ====================== Change Log ================== Version: 1.17 Change: Updated alias section of profile. Risk: Low Importance: Helpful Change: Updated Minimum Blueprint Version. Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.16 Change: Added CurrentStreamingService state to generate in Blueprint Trigger Engine. Risk: Low Importance: Helpful Version: 1.15 Change: Added Live argument to CommandSeek action. Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.14 Change: Implements AVB and 10G data connector resources Risk: Low Importance: Forced Version: 1.13 Change: Added SeekInterval as an argument to the CommandSeek actions. Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.12 Change: Added CommandRepeatOne action. Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.11 Change: Renames surround sound proerties Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.10 Change: Added output surround sound properties Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.9 Change: Added CommandPlayFavorite and ClearQueue actions Risk: Low Importance: Helpful Version: 1.8 Change: Added SetOutputVolume for output trim. Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.7 Change: Adds host relationship connector. Adds doorbell source Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.6 Change: Added CommandDeleteService to SavantMusic Service. Risk: Low Importance: Helpful Version: 1.5 Change: Removed unneeded IR port. Risk: Low Importance: Critical Change: Corrected RS232 Control Options. Risk: Low Importance: Critical Version: 1.4 Change: Adds media specific power management to Savant Music source resources Risk: Medium Importance: Forced Version: 1.3 Change: Updated minimum required Blueprint version and alias. Risk: Low Importance: Helpful Version: 1.2 Change: Fixes switching issue of local inputs over AVB Risk: Low Importance: Critical
